summary: This isn't the first mod like this, but now you have more variety to choose from. This mods removes the racial daily powers and replaces them with a passive. (The races will still keep their old passives as well.)
descriptionHtml:
This isn't the first mod like this, but now you have more variety to choose from. This mods removes the racial daily powers and replaces them with a passive. (The races will still keep their old passives as well.) They are as follows:

Altmer:
Conjuration spells are 20% cheaper.

Bosmer:
Pickpocketing is 10% better and lockpicking is 15% better.

Dunmer:
Destruction and Illusion spells are 10% cheaper.

Imperial:
Prices are 10% better.

Khajiit:
Muffled.

Nord:
25% Shock Resistance.

Orc:
50 extra carry weight. 4 extra unarmed damage.

Redguard:
Stamina regenerates 50% faster.

Breton: Alteration spells are 15% cheaper. Illusion and Restoration are 10% cheaper.

Argonian: 120 extra points of armor. (12% reduction.)
author: Lunar
